properties.name: AmRhein Wine Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster9243 Patterson Drive, Bent Mountain, VA 24059Savor the taste of the Blue Ridge Mountains with some of Virginia\'s finest wines. Sit under the Portico, enjoy the cool mountain breezes, while sampling our award-winning wines, featuring our crisp Pinot Grigio, classic Viognier, exciting Traminette, and our signature red Petit Verdot.

properties.description: Posted by Mapster3138 Jesse Dupont Memorial Highway 22473Athena Winery is the first to be established in Northumberland County. The vineyard and Jefferson style winery are in a park like setting of hills and ponds.

properties.name: Blenheim Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster31 Blenheim Farm, Charlottesville, VA 22902Features single-vineyard Chardonnay, Cabernet Franc, and Merlot, as well as small lots of Bordeaux-style blends from leading Virginia winemaker Brad McCarthy. Tours by appointment only.

properties.name: Bloxom Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster26130 Mason Road, Bloxom, VA 2330835 acre old Victorian farm with 6 acres of Chardonnay, Merlot and Cabernet, just minutes south of Chincoteague Island on Virginia\'s Eastern Shore.

properties.name: Blue Ridge Vineyard

Enjoy a picnic and walk the mountain trails on the 300-acre farm. Opening May, 2006

properties.name: Boundary Rock Farm & Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster414 Riggins Rd. NW, Willis, VA 24380Farmstead family-owned and operated winery growing more than 15 varieties of grapes. We take pride in offering wines from premium varieties like Cabernet Franc and Chardonnay grown on our mountain farm.

properties.name: Boxwood Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster2042 Burrland Road, Middleburg, VA 20117Open Fall 2006. Winery designed by award-winning architect Hugh Newell Jacobsen. Red wine only blended in French Bordeaux tradition. Eighteen-acre vineyard with varieties certified by the French government.

properties.name: Breaux Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster36888 Breaux Vineyards Lane, Purcellville, VA 20132Named the Best Wine in Virginia at the Virginia State Fair. Come enjoy our internationally acclaimed wines. Our tasting room and gift shop offer exquisite views of the Blue Ridge and Short Hill Mountains. Enjoy light gourmet fare by the stone fireplace or on Patio Madeleine.

properties.name: Bright Meadows Farm Vineyard & Winery
properties.description: Posted by MapsterNathalie, VA 24577Nestled among the rolling hills of historic Halifax County, on the site of a 19th century tobacco plantation, small family owned and operated winery. Restored 115 year old barn offering country wines and southern hospitality. Scenic 50 acre farm with walking paths and picnic area.

properties.name: Burnley Vineyards & Daniel Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster4500 Winery Lane, Barboursville, VA 22923Family-owned and operated since 1977. We cultivate 30 acres of grapes. Winery includes tasting room, guest house, banquet room, deck overlooking vineyard and picnic area. We make 13 wines.

properties.name: Cardinal Point Vineyard & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster9423 Batesville Road, Afton, VA 22920Ideally situated within view of the Rockfish Gap, the Blue Ridge Parkway and Skyline Drive. Sample our award winning wines and enjoy the views from our patio. Don\'t miss our video presentation of seasonal activities in the vineyard and winery.

properties.name: Chateau O'Brien at Northpoint
properties.description: Posted by Mapster3238 Rail Stop Road, Markham, VA 22643 Opening November 2006! No Buses!

properties.name: Chatham Vineyards & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster9232 Chatham Road, Machipongo, VA 23405 Located on Virginia\'s Eastern Shore at historic Chatham Farm on land first patented in 1640, between the Chesapeake Bay and the Atlantic Ocean. please call 757-678-5588. Scheduled to open April 2006.

properties.name: Chester Gap Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster4615 Remount Road, Front Royal, VA 22630 Located on Chester Gap, in scenic Rappanhannock County, we are a family owned and operated farm winery, producing hand crafted wines from our mountainside vineyards. Varieties include Viognier, Petit Manseng, Merlot, Cabernet Franc and Petit Verdot. Come enjoy our wines and spectacular views.

properties.name: Christensen Ridge
properties.description: Posted by MapsterMadison, VA 22727Two hundred acres in Blue Ridge, spectacular views, and one of Virginia\'s oldest vineyards. Cabernet Franc, Sangiovese blend, Merlot, Viognier, Vidal Blanc and Chardonnay. Log cabin & 5-bedroom home w/pool.

properties.name: Chrysalis Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster23876 Champe Ford Road, Middleburg, VA 20117Enjoy our award winning wines in a beautiful setting just outside the village of Middleburg. In just a few short years, we have become one of Virginia\'s finest estate wineries, growing unique Spanish and French varietals and celebrating the homecoming of Norton, the Real American Grape!

properties.name: Château Morrisette
properties.description: Posted by MapsterP. O. Box 766, Meadows of Dan, VA 24120Overlooking the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountains, Château Morrisette offers breathtaking vistas, award winning wines, elegant dining and first-class hospitality. Open year round for tours, tastings sales and memorable dining.

properties.name: Cooper Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster13372 Shannon Hill Road., Louisa, VA 23226Experience Rhapsody and our award-winning 100% Virginia wines. Bring your own picnic to have beside the vines. Unique tasting room inside the winery itself. Purchase discounted tickets online for our winery events.

properties.name: Davis Valley Winery and Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster1167 Davis Valley Road, Rural Retreat, VA 24368Visit Smyth County\'s first farm winery. We invite you to enjoy the beautiful panoramic vistas of Southwest Virginia from our scenic hilltop setting. Tours available.

properties.name: Deer Meadow Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster199 Vintage Lane, Winchester, VA 22602One of the smallest of Virginia\'s farm wineries, Deer Meadow has been handcrafting quality wines since 1987. Our wines include Chardonnay, Cabernet Sauvignon, Marechal Foch (join the fan club!) and Afternoon of the Fawn.

properties.name: DelFosse Vineyards & Winery
properties.description: Posted by MapsterFaber, VA 22938New in 2005. Quiet elegance in a rural setting in the foothills of the Blue Ridge. Enjoy a 5-mile trail on property, lakes, picnic areas. Premium wines include Chardonnay, Viognier, Cabernet, Merlot, Rose.

properties.name: Dye's Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by MapsterHonaker VA 24260Russell County\'s oldest winery. Whether you are a wine connoisseur or just being introduced to wine, Dye\'s has something just for you, offering such wines as Chardonnay, Cabernet Sauvignon and Golden Muscat.

properties.name: Farfelu Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster13058 Crest Hill Road, Flint Hill, VA 22627Serious Wine for Un-Serious People just 60 miles west of D.C. Award-winning wines served in an 1860s dairy barn turned winery. Our 86-acre estate offers an expansive deck, lawn games, picnic facilities, river trail.

properties.name: Fincastle Vineyard & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster203 Maple Ridge Lane, Fincastle, VA 240902.5 miles off I-81 Exit 156. A family-owned and operated winery producing handcrafted Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc and Chardonnay. Enjoy the serenity of our secluded mountain vineyard from a rocker under the pergola or a hillside picnic table. B&B opening in May.

properties.name: First Colony Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster1650 Harris Creek Road, Charlottesville, VA 22902From historical inspirations to seasoned winemaking expertise, Old World traditions abound at FCW. We have combined our focus on producing world-class wines with gracious hospitality. Indoor/outdoor seating for picnics and events.

properties.name: Fox Meadow Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster3310 Freezeland Road, Linden, VA 22642Opening in May 2006, Fox Meadow Vineyards is located in the Blue Ridge Mountains 40 minutes from I-495. Visitors can relax and enjoy a spectacular view from the tasting room and deck looking across 6 mountain ridges with a 30 mile vista. We specialize in classic vinifera wines. Our picnic grove offers a peaceful setting to enjoy a meal.

properties.name: Gabriele Rausse Winery
properties.description: Posted by MapsterCharlottesville, VA 22903Not open to the public

properties.name: Gadino Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster92 Schoolhouse Road, Washington, VA 22747Slip away to the quiet and beautiful countryside of Rappahannock County. Relax with our fine wines in our old world tasting room or on our sun splashed deck overlooking the vineyards and Blue Ridge Mountains. Our winery is perfectly located between the historic towns of Little Washington and Sperryville featuring many B&Bs, antique and gift shops and fine dining options. Our family\'s commitment is to produce tantalizing wines shared in a fun loving and inviting environment. Every day is casual day at Gadino Cellars so please join us and enjoy wines at your pace.

properties.name: Gray Ghost Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster14706 Lee Highway, Amissville, VA 20106Gray Ghost produces internationally acclaimed wine from immaculate vineyards. Enjoy southern hospitality and beautiful picnic facilities. Gray Ghost offers the original and most popular harvest program in the state.

properties.name: Grayhaven Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster4675 E. Gray Fox Circle, Gum Spring, VA 23065Enjoy the relaxed atmosphere of our family owned farm winery. Just 30 minutes west of Richmond, 30 minutes east of Charlottesville. Surrounded by rolling hills, vineyards and horse pastures, we have lovely areas for picnics and special events. Gift shop and fine art sales. Kids playground.

properties.name: Green Springs Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster1890 Poindexter Road, Louisa, VA 23093Located at Millview Farm on one of Louisa County\'s oldest properties in the National Historic District of Green Springs. Our family-owned winery offers hand-crafted classically styled wines. Come visit us at the winery located in the rolling hills of the Virginia Piedmont with scenic views of our vineyard overlooking our two ponds. Available for private gatherings and events. Our wines include: Cabernet Sauvignon, Cabernet Franc, Merlot, Chardonnay and Rose.

properties.name: Guilford Ridge Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster328 Running Pine Road, Luray, VA 22835Virginia\'s first commercial winegrape vineyard (established 1971), but the tiniest winery (1983) west of the Blue Ridge, south of Luray Caverns. Producing "estate bottled" wines only. Fete grounds/stage available for private events. Groups only (minimum 8), June - November, by advance reservations only. Al fresco tastings only - no winery tours. Phone 540-778-3853

properties.name: Linden Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster3708 Harrels Corner Road, Linden, VA 22642Meticulously managed mountain vineyards yield complex wines with fresh, assertive aromas, concentrated flavors and personality. Specializing in small lots of single vineyard Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc and Bordeaux Red Blends.

properties.name: Lost Creek Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster43277 Spinks Ferry Road, Leesburg, VA 20176The winery, built on a hill, overlooks the vineyards and Northern Virginia horse country. Spacious tasting rooms with areas inside and outside to relax and enjoy the views and the wine.

properties.name: Loudoun Valley Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster38516 Charlestown Pike, Waterford, VA 20197Taste our selection of more than 15 handcrafted, award-winning wines from our special clones of French, German and Italian wine grapes. Glass enclosed tasting room. Come experience our wines and friendship.

properties.name: Lovingston Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster885 Freshwater Cove Lane, Lovingston, VA 22949High quality hand crafted wines produced gently, in small lots, with gravity flow. Opening late 2006.

properties.name: Mediterranean Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster8295 Falcon Glen Road, Warrenton, VA 20186Come sample Romance and other varieties of our fine wines. Enjoy warm Mediterranean hospitality and breathtaking views from our vineyard nestled in the rolling hills of Warrenton.

properties.description: Posted by Mapster1531 Pack Horse Road, Winchester, VA 22603Virginia\'s smallest winery, specializing in the production of Mead (honey wines). Misty Mountain Meadworks is not yet open to the public.

properties.description: Posted by Mapster1362 Fortunes Cove Lane, Lovingston, VA 22949Located in a scenic cove, next to The Nature Conservancy\'s hiking preserve, Mountain Cove is Virginia\'s oldest, continuously operated winery. The Weed family welcomes you to picnic and enjoy local trails.

properties.name: MountainRose Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster10439 N Reservoir Road, Wise, VA 24293Enjoy the only wines from vines grown on former coal mined land. Vineyard fea-tures nine varieties of grapes and more than 100 roses. Tasting room overlooks pond in beautiful mountain setting.

properties.name: Naked Mountain Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster2747 Leeds Manor Road, Markham, VA 22643Chardonnay spoken here. 100% Virginia grown clasic varietals. Discover sensational views from delightful chalet like winery on the sunrise slope of the Blue Ridge. Picnic areas. Cozy fireplace. We welcome your visit.

properties.name: North Mountain Vineyard & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster4374 Swartz Road, Maurertown, VA 22644Discover award-winning, elegant wines exclusive to our vineyard\'s terroir! properties.name: Oak Crest Vineyard & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster8215 Oak Crest Drive, King George, VA 22485Enjoy our Bordeaux-style reds and Rhine-style whites in the relaxed Old World atmosphere of our post-and-beam tasting room, unique gift shop with deck and quiet picnic area.

properties.name: Oakencroft Vineyard & Winery

properties.name: Oasis Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster14141 Hume Road, Hume, VA 22639Rated Top 10 in the World. Indoor & outdoor seating with breathtaking views. Special Events, Weddings, Corporate Retreats. Wine Country Limousine Tours. VIP Tours, Groups available. Member of the Blue RidgeWineWay.com.

properties.name: Old House Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster18351 Corkys Lane, Culpeper, VA 22701Located near historic Culpeper, Old House offers tastings of our award-winning wines in the renovated 1820s farm-house. Bring a picnic and enjoy the beautiful Blue Ridge Mountain views.

properties.name: Peaks of Otter Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster2122 Sheep Creek Road, Bedford, VA 24523"Fruit of the Farm Wines". Taste samples of the fresh fruit used in our wines, jellies, jams, butters and sweet ciders. Picnic in our pavilion and enjoy the breathtaking views.

properties.name: Pearmund Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster6190 Georgetown Road, Broad Run, VA 20137Taste unique superior wines from award-winning Chris Pearmund. Experience romantic views of one of Virginia\'s top quality Chardonnay vineyards. Family owned and operated. Bring your own picnic. Children\'s corner for your convenience.

properties.name: Piedmont Vineyards and Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster2546-D Halfway Road, The Plains, VA 20198Virginia\'s oldest Chardonnay producer, Piedmont Vineyards was established in 1973 on the pre-revolutionary estate, "Waverly", and today offers a variety of wines with an emphasis on world-class Chardonnays.

properties.name: Prince Michel Vineyards & Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster154 Winery Lane, Leon, VA 22725Home to Prince Michel, and Rapidan River wines, Prince Michel Vineyards and Winery is one of Virginia’s premier wine estates. Beautifully situated on Route 29 among the rolling foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, Prince Michel is conveniently connected to Charlottesville, Richmond, and Washington DC. Treat yourself to a picnic on our expansive lawns or simply stroll among the vines. Enjoy a self-guided tour of our state-of-the-art winemaking facility followed by a complementary wine tasting in our newly designed, “see through” tasting room atop the winery. Prince Michel is also the perfect venue for weddings, receptions, corporate events, and exclusive private tours.

properties.name: Rappahannock Cellars
properties.description: Posted by Mapster14437 Hume Road, Huntly, VA 22640Family owned and operated winery, relocated from California to Virginia\'s Hunt Country. Elegant award winning wines include Viognier, Cabernet Franc, Cabernet Sauvignon, Chardonnay, Vidal Blanc & Seyval Blanc.

properties.name: Rebec Vineyards
properties.description: Posted by Mapster2229 North Amherst Highway, Amherst, VA 24521Rebec Vineyards is a 70 acre estate in Amherst County offering beautiful views of the Blue Ridge Mountains. It is listed as a National Historic Landmark. You may bring your own picnic to lunch under cedar, dogwood, and oak trees in the vineyards, except on the second full weekend in October, when Rebec Vineyards hosts the Virginia Wine and Garlic Festival.

properties.name: Rockbridge Vineyard
properties.description: Posted by Mapster35 Hill View Lane, Raphine, VA 24472Winner of the 1995 and 2001 Virginia Governor\'s Cup. Enjoy the splendor of the Shenandoah Valley while sampling award winning wines including Chardonnay, Merlot, Riesling, Cabernet Sauvignon, Vidal Blanc, and Pinot Noir.

properties.name: Rogers Ford Farm Winery
properties.description: Posted by Mapster14674 Rogers Ford Road, Sumerduck, VA 22742Step back into history on our farm dating from 1825. Wine enthusiasts will discover new favorites. Call ahead and enjoy a gourmet picnic basket on private grounds overlooking the Rappahannock.
